title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7202.1 - Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7202.1 - Policy

State Regulations
(a) Consistent with
the requirements of this Part, the commission shall maintain in its records
only such personal information as is relevant and necessary to accomplish the
mandates of the commission as authorized by article 3 of the Correction Law, executive order, or any statutory provision. (b) Personal information shall be collected, whenever practicable, directly from the person to whom the information
pertains, and shall be maintained in an accurate, relevant, timely and complete
manner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7202.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
